logger

Class LogFileGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • logger.LogFileGenerator

  • public class LogFileGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
    Creates a .txt file that will log all the inputs and interactive elements selected by this application on webview.

      • logSummaryStatistics

        public void logSummaryStatistics(java.lang.String testType,
                                 int pagesVisited,
                                 int linksClicked,
                                 int linksFound,
                                 float coverage)
        Appends the summary statistics of a given test to the logfile
        Parameters:
        testType - - the type of test being performed
        pagesVisited - - the number of pages successfully visited during the test
        linksClicked - - the number of links successfully clicked during the test
        linksFound - - the number of links discovered during the test
        coverage - = the percentage coverage for the entire application

      • getFileName

        public java.lang.String getFileName()
        Returns the name of the log file being written to in a particular instance. To be used for comparison purposes in tests.
